nodes.text: MB-6 Micro-Defender Droids were combat droids that were built with high-durability alloys.

MB-6 droids were made available in BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic to players who completed three group missions using the Activities Window between June 1, 2018 and June 3, 2018, as part of an event celebrating friendship.
